channel.title: Merry Christmas Fruits & Vegetables!
channel.description:

I finally got a decent tennis racket

item.title: Merry Christmas Fruits & Vegetables!

item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:25, topic:374884”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=470850.msg3443294#msg3443294 date=1293219583]
I got:

40" Samsung TV
Xbox 360 250GB
PS3 320GB
HD PVR
Dell 15R Laptop
A Hamster
Black Ops Prestige
Some Socks…yeah
[/quote]The fuck? You spoiled brat. You better thank your parents like you never have before.[/quote]
Wait, he wasn’t kidding?? I thought that was a joke wow lol. How fucking rich are you ollie?

At my house my parents spend about 100-200$ a kid. They’re savers.

Read full topic

[quote=“Zhawa, post:21, topic:374884”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=470850.msg3443331#msg3443331 date=1293220980]
X-Mas eve here, no tree, no presents, not a very good time of year for my family. All I am getting (i already know about it), is furniture for my house.
[/quote]

Your very own house?[/quote]
Yes? I have two houses picked out, all that is left is to figure out what one I want, and pay for it.

@topic: It’s still christmas eve in Ireland, so I don’t know what i’m getting yet. :)[/quote]

Go and find out, No harm in opening early ;D

Me and runespace will be at nans for a week, so we wont be on much

Everybody enjoy your christmas ;D(eve)
